title: CLDF dataset derived from Blum et al.'s "A Comparative Wordlist for Investigating Distant Relations Among Languages in Lowland South America (forthcoming).
citation: Blum, Frederic and Barrientos, Carlos and Zariquiey, Roberto and List, Johann-Mattis. Forthcoming. A Comparative Wordlist for Investigating Distant Relations Among Languages in Lowland South America.
description: Comparative wordlist for Panoan and Tacanan languages, as well as a selection of language isolates that have been hypothesized to be related to Pano-Tacanan.
